title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating Checkboxes Should Use Busy Cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating Checkboxes Should Use Busy Cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The process of updating the checked state of the table takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). A busy cursor should be displayed during this update.
EB: During the update of checkbox states, a busy cursor should be promptly displayed to indicate ongoing processing, improving user experience.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Export Zip' feature.
3. Check multiple checkboxes in the table.
4. Observe the slow update process and the absence of a busy cursor during checkbox updates.
